name: BIX Technology

description:
At BIX Technology, we design and develop Business Intelligence applications for small business, midmarkets and enterprises clients. Our services include: Business Intelligence, Advanced Analytics, Strategy & Consulting.
 
We offer services and market leaders tools to make the management of your company more efficient.
 
What does your data has to tell you? We can find out!
